--0-206830027-1178642376=:41292
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

The temporal transwarp rift opens as a small, one bot, Maximal ship comes through. It is battle damaged. Inside we see someone moving in the darkness of the ship, piloting as well as making several other actions on the computers. We cannot quite make out his face as the cockpit isn't lighted well.

Comp: Unable to locate target at this time and range.

The bots fist slams down on the control panel.

Bot: SLAG! I don't have time for this computer. That... That... That OTHER Transformer is about to come through that rift and reduce us to scrap. We have to warn Rodimus! By Primus! This reminds me of the time Rodimus, the Dinobots and I were being dogged by the Decepticon flagship. We took a crash landing on Quintessa, which lead to...

Comp: Beep! Enemy vessel now through rift. Entering weapons range.

Bot: All aft blasters: open fire!

The Maximal ships aft blaster cannons swing into position, fireing a barage of plasma shots at it's enemy.

The enemy cruiser easily avoids these with evasive manuvers. The cruiser is marked on the wings with a symbol unknown to any Transformers on Past-Earth or Cybertron.(It's the G2 Decepticon logo, but no one would know that in this continuity.)

This cruiser positions itself and releases what appears to be two fusion cannon blasts that all but destroy the Maximal ship. The ship enters the atmosphere in this damaged form and barely avoids being burned up. The wreckage hits the Earth hard, roughly two hundred miles from where Perseus, Rodimus and the others are facing Dinobot.

Within the wreckage the bot that had been piloting is seriously damaged. His situation is critical. He manages to send out a looping audio message on Maximal frequencies, from the ships "Little Black Box." He then enters stasis lock.

The message is as follows:

"To Rodimus Prime and all other Maximal and Autobot forces. This is former Autobot City Security Chief Kup. A new threat to Cybertron, Earth and all known Transformers has been located in the Mataria Sector, on the far side of our charted galaxy. A new Decepticon army has been assembled. They are far stronger then any Cybertronian Transformers. They detest us. I don't know how much time we have untill these Decepticons attack Cybertron and any other current or formerly allied planets, including Earth of our present time. The Maximal government does not believe that these Decepticons are aware of the Past-Earth Colonies, but that will change eventually. There is another part of this message that I have encrypted. A Personal message for Rodimus Prime. I hope you remember the code, Roddy. One more thing. If anyone is hearing this message, rather then me telling it in person, chances are... I'm dead."

Elswhere on the planet, the cruiser that shot down Kup swoops down low to the ground before transforming to robot mode. The bot stands tall. Yellow, white, red and black make up this bots color scheme.

Unknown Decepticon: Now any of these Cybertron throwbacks who hide in Earth's past can be eliminated from existance. Most especially... HIM... God I hate them all. Disgusting! They will all fear Lord Jhiaxus!

OOC: This is Lord Jhiaxus, from the Marvel G2 comics, in name and look only. Obviosuly the Marvel comics continuity doesn't fit here.

       
---------------------------------
Ahhh...imagining that irresistible "new car" smell?
 Check outnew cars at Yahoo! Autos.
